document_data.caption: Thantan standing for a portrait.
document_data.name: Thantan Rhyrdyl
document_data.mainbody: '''Thantan Rhyrdyl''' was one of the leaders (a [[Boar's Head]]) of the [[Order of the Blue Boar]], a mercenary recruitment company in [[Amn]].
document_data.Description: Thantan was charismatic to the point of seeming arrogant.
document_data.Activities: He was the battlefield leader of the Order. He was a very cabable cavalry officer.
document_data.History: Hailing from a wealthy Amnian merchant family, Thantan in his youth formed his well-armed and armored private mercenary cavalry company, and left the family business. While disappointed in this, his family did not disown him.
